languages.text: Эдельтрад должен был дать бой Кунраду и прочим еретикам на мостике корабля — ему нужна будет любая помощь в этой контратаке.

traits.locale_text: Эдельтрад должен был дать бой Кунраду и прочим еретикам на мостике корабля — ему нужна будет любая помощь в этой контратаке.

languages.text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.
languages.original_text: Эдельтрад должен был дать бой Кунраду и прочим еретикам на мостике корабля — ему нужна будет любая помощь в этой контратаке.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kundrad and his heretics on the bridge. He'll need any help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.
Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.
Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.

languages.text: Edelthrad wollte Kunrad und seine Ketzer auf der Brücke konfrontieren. Er wird jede Hilfe brauchen, die er kriegen kann, damit der Gegenangriff Erfolg hat.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrad wollte Kunrad und seine Ketzer auf der Brücke konfrontieren. Er wird jede Hilfe brauchen, die er kriegen kann, damit der Gegenangriff Erfolg hat.

languages.text: Edelthrad est parti affronter Kunrad et ses hérétiques sur la passerelle. Il aura besoin de toute l'aide possible pour réussir sa contre-attaque.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrad est parti affronter Kunrad et ses hérétiques sur la passerelle. Il aura besoin de toute l'aide possible pour réussir sa contre-attaque.

languages.text: 艾德萨德准备反攻舰桥，消灭昆拉德和他的异端手下。为了进行反击，他需要一切可以得到的帮助。
languages.original_text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.

traits.locale_text: 艾德萨德准备反攻舰桥，消灭昆拉德和他的异端手下。为了进行反击，他需要一切可以得到的帮助。

languages.text: エデルスラドはブリッジでクンラッドと異端者たちに立ち向かうはずだった。反撃を成功させるためには、あらゆる助けが必要だ。
languages.original_text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.

traits.locale_text: エデルスラドはブリッジでクンラッドと異端者たちに立ち向かうはずだった。反撃を成功させるためには、あらゆる助けが必要だ。

languages.text: Edelthrad iba a enfrentarse a los herejes de Kunrad en el puente. Necesitará toda la ayuda posible para que su contraataque tenga éxito.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrad iba a enfrentarse a los herejes de Kunrad en el puente. Necesitará toda la ayuda posible para que su contraataque tenga éxito.

languages.text: Edelthrad, köprüde Kunrad ile kâfir iş birlikçilerinin karşısına dikilecekti. Karşı saldırının başarılı olabilmesi için her türlü yardıma ihtiyacı olacak.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad was going to confront Kunrad and his heretics on the bridge. He will need all the help he can get for the counter-attack to succeed.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrad, köprüde Kunrad ile kâfir iş birlikçilerinin karşısına dikilecekti. Karşı saldırının başarılı olabilmesi için her türlü yardıma ihtiyacı olacak.
